thread.title: Sri Lanka Navy arrests 12 fishermen, seizes 2 boats from Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam
thread.title_full: Sri Lanka Navy arrests 12 fishermen, seizes 2 boats from Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam

author: FE Online
title: Sri Lanka Navy arrests 12 fishermen, seizes 2 boats from Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam
text:
Sri Lanka Navy arrests 12 fishermen, seizes 2 boats from Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam Sri Lanka Navy arrests 12 fishermen, seizes 2 boats from Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam The year is not going so well for Indian fishermen, as 12 fishermen were arrested and two trawler boats were seized by the Sri Lanka Navy from the Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam districts of Tamil Nadu earlier today. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 26, 2017 10:52 AM (PTI) 
The year is not going so well for Indian fishermen, as 12 fishermen were arrested and two trawler boats were seized by the Sri Lanka Navy from the Pudukkottai and Nagapattinam districts of Tamil Nadu earlier today. This arrest of the fishermen comes a few hours after an attack on around 2000 Tamil fishermen who were there in 400 boats were attacked by the SL navy with beer bottles, stones and iron rods. They have been attacked ahead of the Dhanushkodi region, according to an India Today report. 
Fishermen from Rameshwaram requested for permission from Indian officials before fishing beyond Dhanushkodi. This is not the first time when the Sri Lanka Navy has done something like this. Earlier this month an attack on the fishermen resulted in the death of one of them.

Further details awaited.
